name: Cigarette Man SUPER 3D
description:
Cigareete Man SUPER 3D is a platformer game, you jump to platform to platform, there are moving platforms and static platforms BUT WAIT! there is more! if you like music then you'll love the soundtracks made for Cigarette Man SUPER 3D!!!!!!111!.

NOTE: you cant play this on a old or bad laptop, im sorry i really tried but i couldnt fix it.
